Windows 8 Development: xaml properties

07 January 2015

Overview

Windows 8.1 use the MVVM pattern for their apps. For their View, they use xaml, this post is about the different types of xaml properties. More information can be found here.

Examples

 1 <!-- variable name to be used in code -->
 2 <Button x:Name="myButton" />
 3 
 4 <!-- background color -->
 5 <Button Background="Blue" />
 6 
 7 <!-- text on the button -->
 8 <Button Content="This is the text you'll see" />
 9 
10 <!-- font size in pixels -->
11 <Button FontSize="42" />
12 
13 <!-- align Left or Right -->
14 <Button HorizontalAlighment="Left" />
15 
16 <!-- Margin <left,top,right,bottom> vs css' <top,right,bottom,left> -->
17 <Button Margin="0,20,0,5" />
18 
19 <!-- align Top or Down -->
20 <Button VerticalAlighment="Top" />
21 
22 <!-- Height and Width in pixels -->
23 <Button Height="100" Width="100" />
24 
25 <!-- text to be displayed -->
26 <Label Text="Hello, XAML!" />
27 
28 <!-- text color  -->
29 <Label TextColor="Aqua" />
